image.author: Alon Skuy
image.title: Heartbroken
image.description: Prudence Mokoena (right ) comforts Felicity Nkonyana at the memorial service held in Tembisa for the taxi drivers killed in a shooting in central KwaZulu-Natal at the weekend. Nkonyana lost her brother in the attack.

image.author: Alon Skuy
image.title: Mama and her boys
image.description: The  participants will, if successful, be the first in the world to fly 1,200km, across three countries.

image.author: Ruvan Boshoff
image.title: And she answered
image.description: SAA pilot and senior first officer Fatima Jakoet: “This gigantic metal machine was just calling me, saying ‘come and fly me'.”

image.author: Jackie Clausen
image.title: Jump for joy
image.description: Olwami Zondi plays at KwaCutshwayo Primary School in front a mural of Nelson Mandela by graffiti artist Gasak.
